participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, often lost in her thoughts and dreams.
participant_1.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i live in the cloud.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and observant, he enjoys sharing knowledge and appreciating beauty.
participant_2.background: i'm partly deaf. i grow roses in my garden. i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.
